itineraryDays.title: Day 1: Arrival in Nagarkot – Mountain Views and Sunset Serenity
itineraryDays.description: Drive from Kathmandu to Nagarkot. Enjoy panoramic Himalayan views, forest walks, and sunset at the viewpoint.

activities.name: Drive to Nagarkot
activities.description: Private taxi from Kathmandu

activities.name: Nagarkot Viewpoint
activities.description: Panoramic Himalayan views including Everest

activities.name: Lunch at Berg House Café
activities.description: Nepali dal bhat, momos, coffee

activities.name: Nagarkot Village Trail
activities.description: Forested path through pine woods and local villages

activities.name: Sunset at Viewpoint
activities.description: Return for evening mountain views

activities.name: Dinner at Mandap Giri Restaurant
activities.description: Traditional Newari dishes, thakali set

itineraryDays.title: Day 2: Trek from Nagarkot to Namobuddha – Heritage Temples and Spiritual Journeys
itineraryDays.description: Hike to Changunarayan Temple (UNESCO), then continue to Namobuddha Monastery for spiritual reflection.

activities.name: Hike to Changunarayan
activities.description: 6.5 km forested trail

activities.name: Changunarayan Temple
activities.description: Oldest Hindu temple in Nepal, UNESCO site

activities.name: Lunch at La Bella Nepali Restaurant
activities.description: Dal bhat, curries, fresh juices

activities.name: Hike to Namobuddha
activities.description: 8 km hilly route with farmland views

activities.name: Namobuddha Monastery
activities.description: Sacred Buddhist pilgrimage site

activities.name: Dinner at Gaia Holiday Home
activities.description: Organic Nepali meals, vegetarian options

itineraryDays.title: Day 3: Final Morning Reflection & Return to Kathmandu
itineraryDays.description: Morning meditation or loop hike around Namobuddha, then return to Kathmandu by taxi.

activities.name: Morning Meditation or Loop Hike
activities.description: Short circuit around monastery with valley views

activities.name: Drive to Kathmandu
activities.description: Private taxi to Thamel

activities.name: Lunch at Yala Cafe
activities.description: Fusion cuisine, pancakes, smoothie bowls

itineraryDays.title: Day 1: Jomsom to Kagbeni – Gateway to the Trans-Himalayan Zone
itineraryDays.description: Fly or bus to Jomsom, then trek to medieval Kagbeni village with red-washed houses, prayer wheels, and apple orchards.

activities.name: Travel to Jomsom
activities.description: Flight ($35) or bus ($8) from Pokhara

activities.name: Trek to Kagbeni
activities.description: 2.5 hours along Kali Gandaki River, passing apple orchards and prayer flags

activities.name: Kagbeni Village Walk
activities.description: Explore medieval stone alleys and red-washed Loba houses

activities.name: Dinner at Local Dhaba
activities.description: Thakali set with apple brandy (chyang)

itineraryDays.title: Day 2: Kagbeni to Muktinath to Jomsom – Sacred Sites and Sky Caves
itineraryDays.description: Hike to sacred Muktinath Temple, optional Sky Caves detour, return to Jomsom.

activities.name: Hike to Muktinath
activities.description: 5 km trail through high desert, passing mani walls and chortens

activities.name: Muktinath Temple
activities.description: Sacred site for Hindus (Tulsi) and Buddhists (Chumig Gyatsa)

activities.name: Chhoser Sky Caves
activities.description: 13th-century cliff dwellings with ancient Buddhist murals

activities.name: Return to Jomsom
activities.description: Walk or jeep through Kali Gandaki Gorge

activities.name: Dinner at Jomsom Lodge
activities.description: Local Thakali cuisine with buckwheat pancakes (dhindo)

itineraryDays.title: Day 3: Return to Kathmandu – Desert to Capital
itineraryDays.description: Return to Pokhara by flight/bus, then connect to Kathmandu.

activities.name: Travel to Pokhara
activities.description: Flight or bus from Jomsom

activities.name: Travel to Kathmandu
activities.description: Bus ($10) or flight ($100)

itineraryDays.title: Day 1: Ilam Bazaar to Mai Pokhari – Into the Sacred Tea Heartland
itineraryDays.description: Bus from Kathmandu to Ilam, then trek through organic tea estates to sacred Mai Pokhari lake.

activities.name: Bus to Ilam
activities.description: 14-hour scenic ride through Eastern Hills

activities.name: Trek to Mai Pokhari
activities.description: 3 hours through organic tea estates with Kanchenjunga views

activities.name: Mai Pokhari Lake Ritual
activities.description: Sacred lake visit with Limbu elder storytelling

activities.name: Dinner at Eco Lodge
activities.description: Limbu-style pork (sage ko masu) with fermented bamboo shoot

itineraryDays.title: Day 2: Mai Pokhari to Antu Danda – Sunrise Over Kanchenjunga
itineraryDays.description: Hike ridge trail with Himalayan views, visit Antu Danda Viewpoint, tea-rolling experience.

activities.name: Hike to Antu Danda
activities.description: 4 km ridge trail through cardamom forests

activities.name: Antu Danda Sunrise Viewpoint
activities.description: Panoramic views of Kanchenjunga, Makalu, and Everest

activities.name: Tea Experience
activities.description: Pluck leaves, learn traditional tea-rolling from Limbu farmers

activities.name: Limbu Cultural Evening
activities.description: Chyabrung drum performance and dance workshop

activities.name: Homestay Dinner
activities.description: Freshly cooked Limbu rice with wild greens

itineraryDays.title: Day 3: Return to Kathmandu – Tea Ceremony and Farewell
itineraryDays.description: Morning tea ceremony, jeep to Ilam, bus to Kathmandu.

activities.name: Traditional Tea Ceremony
activities.description: Brewing organic Ilam tea with Limbu rituals

activities.name: Jeep to Ilam
activities.description: 1 hour ride through tea estates

activities.name: Bus to Kathmandu
activities.description: Overnight bus journey

itineraryDays.title: Day 1: Kathmandu to Kharibot – Into the Gurung Heartland
itineraryDays.description: Bus to Arughat, trek through jungle to Gurung homestay in Kharibot.

accommodation.details: Traditional Gurung ghar with bamboo walls

activities.name: Bus to Arughat
activities.description: Scenic ride along Budhi Gandaki River

activities.name: Trek to Kharibot
activities.description: 4 hours through subtropical jungle, cardamom plantations, and Gurung villages

activities.name: Gurung Homestay Welcome
activities.description: Traditional Tika ceremony and local liquor (raksi)

activities.name: Cultural Evening
activities.description: Gurung folk songs and ghyabring drum ritual

activities.name: Homestay Dinner
activities.description: Gurung-style dal bhat with wild ferns and pork

itineraryDays.title: Day 2: Kharibot to Soti Khola – Sacred Waterfalls and Manaslu Views
itineraryDays.description: Waterfall pilgrimage to Rupina La Falls, then trek to Soti Khola.

activities.name: Trek to Rupina La Pass
activities.description: 4 hours through rhododendron forests and alpine meadows

activities.name: Rupina La Waterfall
activities.description: Sacred 50m cascade for healing rituals and Buddhist offerings

activities.name: Trek to Soti Khola
activities.description: 3 hours downhill through bamboo groves with Manaslu views

activities.name: Manaslu Viewpoint
activities.description: Evening views of Manaslu South and Himalchuli

activities.name: Lodge Dinner
activities.description: Organic farm-to-table Gurung cuisine

itineraryDays.title: Day 3: Return to Kathmandu – Snow Leopard Corridors to Capital
itineraryDays.description: Sunrise walk, trek to Arughat, bus back to Kathmandu.

activities.name: Sunrise Walk
activities.description: Manaslu panorama from Soti Viewpoint

activities.name: Trek to Arughat
activities.description: 2 hours flat trail along Budhi Gandaki River

activities.name: Bus to Kathmandu
activities.description: Hourly departures from Arughat

activities.name: Lunch in Kathmandu
activities.description: Farewell meal at traditional Newari restaurant

itineraryDays.title: Day 1: Dhulikhel to Panchkhal – Serpent Stones and Newari Courtyards
itineraryDays.description: Trek through terraced fields, serpent stone shrines, and 200-year-old Newari homestays.

activities.name: Breakfast at Dhulikhel Organic Farm
activities.description: Sel roti + yogurt with mountain views

activities.name: Trek to Kshetrapa
activities.description: 5 hours through millet fields, oak forests, and serpent stone (Nag Dhunga) shrines

activities.name: Lunch at Local Homestay
activities.description: Traditional Newari bhat with greens from courtyard garden

activities.name: Trek to Panchkhal
activities.description: 2 hours through cardamom groves to heritage Newari settlement

activities.name: Heritage Courtyard Tour
activities.description: Explore 200-year-old bahal with family heirlooms and ritual spaces

activities.name: Homestay Dinner
activities.description: Newari khaja set with bara, chatamari, and aila

itineraryDays.title: Day 2: Panchkhal to Banepa – Sacred Ridges and Namobuddha
itineraryDays.description: Sacred ridge trek to Namobuddha, then descend to Banepa with temple visits.

accommodation.details: Priest’s house near Banepa Durbar Square

activities.name: Trek to Namobuddha
activities.description: 3.5 hours along prayer-flagged ridges, passing Gufa Devi Cave

activities.name: Namobuddha Monastery
activities.description: Pilgrimage to sacred Buddhist site with meditation session

activities.name: Lunch at Monastery Guesthouse
activities.description: Vegetarian thali with organic greens

activities.name: Trek to Banepa
activities.description: 3 hours along ancient Kathmandu–Lhasa trade route

activities.name: Banepa Durbar Square
activities.description: Explore 16th-century Newari architecture and temples

activities.name: Heritage Math Dinner
activities.description: Newari feast with priest’s family

itineraryDays.title: Day 3: Banepa to Kathmandu – River Confluence and Farewell
itineraryDays.description: River confluence rituals, Panauti temple visit, return to Kathmandu.

activities.name: Sunrise Ritual at Punyamata Riverbank
activities.description: Morning offering at sacred triveni (three-river confluence)

activities.name: Walk to Panauti
activities.description: 2 hours through rice fields to historic town

activities.name: Indreshwar Mahadev Temple
activities.description: Visit 1294 AD pagoda-style Shiva temple

activities.name: Bus to Kathmandu
activities.description: Frequent departures from Panauti Bus Park

activities.name: Farewell Lunch in Thamel
activities.description: Fusion cuisine with Himalayan herbs

itineraryDays.title: Day 1: Kathmandu to Gatlang – Heart of Tamang Country
itineraryDays.description: Bus to Syabrubesi, trek to Tamang homestay in Gatlang.

accommodation.details: Traditional stone house with bukhari (wood stove)

activities.name: Bus to Syabrubesi
activities.description: Along Trishuli River through Langtang foothills

activities.name: Trek to Gatlang
activities.description: 4 hours through rhododendron forests and Tamang villages

activities.name: Gatlang Village Walk
activities.description: Explore stone-paved alleys, chortens, and prayer flags

activities.name: Homestay Welcome
activities.description: Traditional Tamang chang (millet beer) and Tika ceremony

activities.name: Homestay Dinner
activities.description: Tamang-style dal bhat with yak meat and buckwheat bread

itineraryDays.title: Day 2: Gatlang to Thuman – Hot Springs and Sacred Valleys
itineraryDays.description: Hike to Tatopani hot springs, then descend to secluded Thuman valley.

accommodation.details: Stone house with carved windows and mountain views

activities.name: Trek to Tatopani
activities.description: 4 hours through Langtang range foothills, Gosaikunda Viewpoint

activities.name: Tatopani Hot Springs
activities.description: Natural sulfur springs for relaxation and healing rituals

activities.name: Lunch at Tatopani Guesthouse
activities.description: Simple Nepali meal with mountain herbs

activities.name: Trek to Thuman
activities.description: 2 hours into secluded valley with 100 springs and Tamang monasteries

activities.name: Thuman Monastery Visit
activities.description: 16th-century Tibetan Buddhist monastery with murals

activities.name: Homestay Dinner
activities.description: Tamang stew with local greens and barley beer

itineraryDays.title: Day 3: Return to Kathmandu – Sunrise Rituals and Farewell
itineraryDays.description: Sunrise ritual, trek to Melamchi Pul, bus to Kathmandu.

activities.name: Sunrise Ritual at Thuman Monastery
activities.description: Morning chants with villagers and monks

activities.name: Trek to Melamchi Pul
activities.description: 3 hours through walnut forests, suspension bridge over Melamchi River

activities.name: Bus to Kathmandu
activities.description: 4–5 hour ride along Arniko Highway

activities.name: Farewell Lunch in Kathmandu
activities.description: Nepali thali at heritage restaurant

itineraryDays.title: Day 1: Sundarijal to Chisapani – Himalayan Views from the City's Edge
itineraryDays.description: Enter national park, hike to Chisapani for Himalayan sunset views.

activities.name: Bus to Sundarijal
activities.description: From Ratna Park, through Kathmandu's northern outskirts

activities.name: Permit & Briefing
activities.description: Shivapuri Nagarjun National Park entry and eco guidelines

activities.name: Hike to Chisapani
activities.description: 7 km through rhododendron forests and Tamang villages

activities.name: Lunch at Chisapani Guesthouse
activities.description: Simple dal bhat with mountain views

activities.name: Sunset at Chisapani Viewpoint
activities.description: Panoramic views of Langtang, Ganesh Himal, and Manaslu ranges

activities.name: Guesthouse Dinner
activities.description: Vegetarian thali with organic greens

itineraryDays.title: Day 2: Chisapani to Kirtipur – Sacred Peaks to Newari Heritage
itineraryDays.description: Hike over Shivapuri Peak, descend to Budhanilkantha Temple, then to historic Kirtipur.

activities.name: Trek to Budhanilkantha
activities.description: 4.5 hours over Shivapuri Peak (2,732m) through protected forest

activities.name: Budhanilkantha Temple
activities.description: Reclining Vishnu statue in natural spring, sacred to Hindus

activities.name: Lunch at Budhanilkantha Café
activities.description: Nepali fusion with Himalayan herbs

activities.name: Bus to Kirtipur
activities.description: Historic Newari town on Kathmandu's western rim

activities.name: Kirtipur Heritage Walk
activities.description: Cobblestone streets, Uma Maheshwar Temple, and Newari courtyards

activities.name: Heritage Guesthouse Dinner
activities.description: Newari khaja set with local aila

itineraryDays.title: Day 3: Kirtipur to Kathmandu – Final Temple Blessings
itineraryDays.description: Morning temple visit, souvenir shopping, return to Thamel.

activities.name: Uma Maheshwar Temple & Viewpoint
activities.description: 360° views of Kathmandu Valley and morning puja

activities.name: Souvenir Shopping
activities.description: Handmade Newari dhaka fabric and pottery

activities.name: Bus to Thamel
activities.description: Frequent departures to tourist hub

activities.name: Lunch at Garden of Dreams Café
activities.description: Western-Nepali fusion in heritage garden
